column4: my option to change the number of workspaces is disabled. is there anyway to get around that? i only have one workspace.
in Compiz? Are you in Plane and Slide or Cube and Rotation mode?
What version of Ubuntu are you in, Feisty?
run 'sudo apt-get install compiz-tray-icon', then when it's running, set it to "cube and rotation", and play around with those settings
